::Shredder::

Shredder walks into the control room, nearly getting his head blown off by a 
laser shot. He looks around at Quickstrike and those firing at him.

No one was gonna finish off Quickstrike but himself! He growls and rolls 
forward to near Quickstrike. Shredder stands up.

"Everyone, hold your fire! I'm here from Hell Beast and Megatron to 
interrogate him!" he yells at those assembled, pointing at Quickstrike.
